text: Nabab LLB () is an upcoming Bangladeshi Bangla language feature film directed by Ananya Mamun and produced by Celebrity Production. The film is about raising awareness against rape. The film stars Shakib Khan, and features Mahiya Mahi and Orchita Sporshia in other leading roles. The film was scheduled to start in March,2020, postponed due to COVID-19 pandemic; later started shooting on 30 August, 2020. Production house is planning to release the film on 23 October, 2020. == Cast == == Production == Ananya Mamum announced the film on 15 March 2020 after he had written the screenplay and both Mahi and Orchita confirmed the signing for the film. Shakib is playing the role of a lawyer. Shakib acted a film named Nabab in 2017. Ananya Mamun vows that, this film is not a remake or sequel of previous one. During COVID-19 break, Dipankar Dipon joins the team as script doctor. According to Bangla Tribune, Celebrity Productions set the initial budget at 15 million BDT. === Filming === Principal photography was scheduled to begin on 28 March 2020, but was quickly halted due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh. The filming is scheduled to resume after situation becomes suitable. After a long break, the shoot has started on 30 August 2020. === Music === Tabib Mahmud penned the title song for Nabab LLB. == Publicity and release == On 17 March 2020, the official first look was released by Anonno Mamun via the film's Facebook page. The film was initially scheduled to be released in cinemas on Eid al-Fitr 2020, but has been postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Nabab LLB is planned to release on 23 October 2020. == References == Category:Upcoming films Category:Films postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Bangladeshi films Category:Film productions suspended due to the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Nabab LLB
